com.actinarium.rhythm

Class LayerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.actinarium.rhythm.RhythmOverlayInflater.LayerConfig

  • public class LayerConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes spec layer configuration (arguments and metadata). Used internally by RhythmOverlayInflater to describe configuration of layers to be created and their resulting hierarchy.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ArgumentsBundle mArgumentsBundle 
      protected int mIndent 
      protected java.lang.String mLayerType

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayerConfig

        public LayerConfig(@NonNull
                   java.lang.String layerType,
                   int indent,
                   @NonNull
                   ArgumentsBundle argumentsBundle)
        Create layer config object for layer of given type, with known indent, and with pre-filled arguments bag
        Parameters:
        layerType - spec layer type, used for appropriate factory lookup
        indent - number of leading spaces in the config line, used to resolve layer hierarchy
        argumentsBundle - an object describing parsed layer configuration (arguments and values)
